message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get you on board. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,200,001.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value of the product to me. Let's see if we can make this work.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1,300,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. This is a fair price that allows for both of us to make a reasonable profit. Let's finalize this deal and get this product in my hands.

Bob, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1,250,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,400,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
